title: Rural industries
creator_credit: John Leake, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia in the 80’s”.
Australia’s modern techniques of cultivation and harvesting are demonstrated to show how this country is a major supplier of grain to the world. The film also shows how the cattle and livestock industry supply food to most parts of the globe.
